DOC.brief_summary: To address pertinent question regard utilization stereotactic Body Radiotherapy ( SBRT ) treat prostate cancer . The Florida Robotic Radiosurgery Association ( FRRA ) launch first registry prostate cancer patient treat SBRT . The registry design track surrogate treatment endpoint include prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) , international prostate symptom score ( IPSS ) , sexual health men ( SHIM ) , visual analogue scale ( VAS ) score , addition physical survival data . Utilizing independent vendor ( Advertek , Inc. ) experience design implementation similar electronic registry , FRRA develop data collection tool staff member basic medical background use register upload pertinent patient data , require 20 30 minute per patient . Participating patient monitor follow-up three year , analysis publication result semi-annually .
DOC.detailed_description: To address pertinent question regard utilization radiosurgery ( SBRT ) treat prostate cancer . The Florida Robotic Radiosurgery Association ( FRRA ) launch first registry prostate cancer patient treat SBRT . The registry design track surrogate treatment endpoint include PSA , IPSS , SHIM , QOL , Karnofsky Performance Status , VAS score , urine bowel health , addition physical survival data . Utilizing independent vendor ( Advertek , Inc. ) experience design implementation similar electronic registry . FRRA develop data collection tool staff member basic medical background use register upload pertinent patient data require 20 30 minute per patient . Participating patient monitor follow-up three year , analysis publication result semi-annually .
DOC.criteria: pathological diagnosis prostate cancer early intermediate risk high risk prostate cancer
